scripts.bake-darwin: pkg --public --targets node12-macos-x64 --output=out/drivers/driver-darwin bakeIndex.js && cp node_modules/playwright/browsers.json out/drivers
scripts.bake-win32: pkg --public --targets node12-win-x86 --output=out/drivers/driver-win32.exe bakeIndex.js && cp node_modules/playwright/browsers.json out/drivers
scripts.bake-win32-amd64: pkg --public --targets node12-win-x64 --output=out/drivers/driver-win32-amd64.exe bakeIndex.js && cp node_modules/playwright/browsers.json out/drivers
scripts.bake-linux: pkg --public --targets node12-linux-x64 --output=out/drivers/driver-linux bakeIndex.js && cp node_modules/playwright/browsers.json out/drivers
scripts.bake-all: npm run bake-darwin && npm run bake-win32 && npm run bake-win32-amd64 && npm run bake-linux
